page.title: 11Lucy's School Day
page.content: I wake up at seven, then at seven thirty I get dressed and go down to have my breakfast which is toast and tea. Eight o'clock is time to get ready for school and brush my hair. I set off at eight thirty. School starts at nine. At five minutes past nine Mrs. Everitt comes to collect money for dinners & at 9.15 we go to assembly. At 9.3O we start Maths usually till break at 1O,3O. After break we do English until lunch at midday. Most people have a dinner cooked at school & others have sandwiches. Playtime lasts until one o'clock. From one to two we have art, often clay modelling, folllowed by another play.The day ends with project work,games and a story till 3.3O.
